de: In the heart of the medieval village of Désaignes, classified as a "village of character", L'Âne Têtu offers a vegetarian cuisine with local, seasonal and environmentally friendly ingredients which become the basis of an exclusive taste experience.
ru: In the heart of the medieval village of Désaignes, classified as a "village of character", L'Âne Têtu offers a vegetarian cuisine with local, seasonal and environmentally friendly ingredients which become the basis of an exclusive taste experience.
en: In the heart of the medieval village of Désaignes, L'Âne Têtu offers a vegetarian cuisine with local, seasonal and environmentally friendly ingredients which become the basis of an exclusive taste experience.
it: In the heart of the medieval village of Désaignes, classified as a "village of character", L'Âne Têtu offers a vegetarian cuisine with local, seasonal and environmentally friendly ingredients which become the basis of an exclusive taste experience.
fr: Au cœur du village médiéval de Désaignes, L'Âne Têtu propose une cuisine végétale avec des ingrédients locaux, de saison et issus d'une agriculture respectueuse de l'environnement, qui deviennent la base d'une expérience gustative exclusive.
zh: In the heart of the medieval village of Désaignes, classified as a "village of character", L'Âne Têtu offers a vegetarian cuisine with local, seasonal and environmentally friendly ingredients which become the basis of an exclusive taste experience.
es: In the heart of the medieval village of Désaignes, classified as a "village of character", L'Âne Têtu offers a vegetarian cuisine with local, seasonal and environmentally friendly ingredients which become the basis of an exclusive taste experience.
nl: In het hart van het middeleeuwse dorp Désaignes, biedt L'Âne Têtu een vegetarische keuken met lokale, seizoensgebonden en milieuvriendelijke ingrediënten die de basis worden van een exclusieve smaakervaring.
